TopicTitle: Photon Torpedo SSTO (Mk2 Expansion Mod Pack)

Articles.Content:
This small SSTO not only looks cool, but also can go to a 75 km orbit in the new 1.0.2 aerodynamics... with a payload! The only mod I used is the Mk2 Expansion that is actually where this SSTO shines, it can go to orbit because of the Two-State Air Intake and the ESTOC engine parts. This is also is a VTOL ONLY SSTO, because only uses the engine in close-cycle mode, 2 airbrakes and 8 vernor thrusters to land after a reentry.

Also if you want to proof that it can go to orbit here's a Small Imgur Album

DOWNLOAD
